title: Any form of art is a form of power; it has impact, it can affect change - it can not only move us, it makes us move.
author: Ossie Davis

Third, we must change the character of our politics to promote fertile ground for reforms.
author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

title: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the game.

title: If you want to truly understand something, try to change it.

title: If you change nothing, nothing will change.
author: Rajkummar Rao

author: Richard Hooker

title: As human beings we do change, grow, adapt, perhaps even learn and become wiser.
author: Wendy Carlos

author: Ricky Williams

author: Alicia Garza

title: It's not the destination that matters. It's the change of scene.

author: Bill Tilden

author: Stephen Covey

title: A change of scenery can help everything.
author: Drew Pomeranz

author: Eckhart Tolle

title: The world is changing quickly and we must be ready to change with it or risk being left behind.
author: Najib Razak

title: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
author: Plutarch

author: Lawrence Kudlow

title: Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances.

title: A change of environment is pretty refreshing.
author: Owen Farrell

author: Bill Drayton

author: W. Edwards Deming

author: Frances Beinecke

author: Kimberle Williams Crenshaw

author: Frank Ocean

author: Anastacia

author: Jesse Jackson

author: Christian de Duve

author: Oprah Winfrey

author: Jane Goodall

author: Hugo Black

author: William H. McRaven

author: Kimberly Bryant

author: Will Durant

author: Madeleine M. Kunin

author: Steve Harvey

author: John Milton

author: David Suzuki

author: Soren Kierkegaard

author: Emma Goldman

author: Eddie Vedder

author: Colin Kaepernick

author: Erik Voorhees

author: Christine and the Queens

title: The power of social media is it forces necessary change.
author: Erik Qualman

title: The great growling engine of change - technology.
author: Alvin Toffler

author: Michael Franti

title: When we change the way we communicate, we change society.

title: Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they're big, flashing signs that something needs to change.
author: Gretchen Rubin

author: Angela Merkel

title: Change comes from reflection.
author: Genesis P-Orridge

title: I was born not knowing and have had only a little time to change that here and there.
author: Richard P. Feynman

title: If you want to have clean ideas, change them as often as your shirt.
author: Francis Picabia

author: Steve Jobs

title: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges.
author: Joyce Meyer

author: Theodore Zeldin

title: It's always good to change and keep things fresh, whether it's a hairstyle or wardrobe.
author: Sheamus

author: James Russell Lowell

author: Harry S Truman

title: Make no mistake about it: Change is hard, but change is necessary.

title: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.
author: Jim Rohn

title: Change is the end result of all true learning.
author: Leo Buscaglia

author: Patrick J. Kennedy

title: Only idiots refuse to change their minds.

author: Bill Gates

title: Peace, unity, love, and nonviolence should be our rallying cry and the catalyst for change in our nation.
author: Tony Evans

title: We shall never change our political leaders until we change the people who elect them.

author: Stephen M. Ross

author: Carl Rogers

author: John Delaney

title: You can change your world by changing your words... Remember, death and life are in the power of the tongue.
author: Joel Osteen

title: Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
author: Mary Ritter Beard

author: Israel Folau

title: I can't change the past, but one person can change the future - anything can happen.
author: Paul Mooney

title: Everybody is going to have an opinion on you; not everyone is going to like you. You can't live your life based on other people's opinions of you or let that change what you do or how you feel about yourself, because then you're not living.
author: Rumer Willis

author: Marilyn Ferguson

title: Exploring and colonizing Mars can bring us new scientific understanding of climate change, of how planet-wide processes can make a warm and wet world into a barren landscape. By exploring and understanding Mars, we may gain key insights into the past and future of our own world.
author: Buzz Aldrin

title: As the world we live in is so unpredictable, the ability to learn and to adapt to change is imperative, alongside creativity, problem-solving, and communication skills.
author: Alain Dehaze

title: I realized if you can change a classroom, you can change a community, and if you change enough communities you can change the world.
author: Erin Gruwell

author: John Trudell

author: Philip Wylie

title: Life is tough - and you have to be tougher than life to change the world.
author: Sebastian Pinera

title: If you begin to understand what you are without trying to change it, then what you are undergoes a transformation.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

title: If you don't like the way the world is, you change it. You have an obligation to change it. You just do it one step at a time.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

author: James Howard Kunstler

title: There are many things we do not want about the world. Let us not just mourn them. Let us change them.
author: Ferdinand Marcos

author: J.I.D

title: Real change is always violent, but it may hurt a lot less than what's in place before the violence occurs.
author: John Edgar Wideman

title: If anything is certain, it is that change is certain. The world we are planning for today will not exist in this form tomorrow.
author: Phil Crosby

title: Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.
author: John Wooden

author: S. Truett Cathy

title: Change is inevitable, and you can't stop that change. You say, 'Wait, stop,' and it just drives right over you.
author: Randy Bachman

title: God, give us grace to accept with serenity the things that cannot be changed, courage to change the things which should be changed and the wisdom to distinguish the one from the other.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

title: Money is always there but the pockets change; it is not in the same pockets after a change, and that is all there is to say about money.
author: Gertrude Stein

title: Art was, seriously, the only thing I'd ever wanted to own. It has always been for me a stable nourishment. I use it. It can change the way that I feel in the mornings.
author: David Bowie

title: Enjoying success requires the ability to adapt. Only by being open to change will you have a true opportunity to get the most from your talent.
author: Nolan Ryan

title: It hasn't always been easy. There's a lot of hard moments. Sometimes you learn from the end of the bench. Sometimes you learn from injuries. author: Kyle Korver

title: This life is a hospital in which every patient is possessed with a desire to change his bed.
author: Charles Baudelaire

title: There's a lot of things that need to change. One specifically? Police brutality.
author: Colin Kaepernick

title: We can change the world if we change ourselves. We just need to get hold of the old patterns of thinking and dealing with things and start listening to our inner voices and trusting our own superpowers.
author: Nina Hagen

author: Tara Westover

title: Empathy is the starting point for creating a community and taking action. It's the impetus for creating change.
author: Max Carver

title: Life is full of tough decisions, and nothing makes them easy. But the worst ones are really your personal koans, and tormenting ambivalence is just the sense of satori rising. author: Martha Beck

title: The good and bad things are what form us as people... change makes us grow.
author: Kate Winslet

title: Change is always good. It brings you to a new place.
author: Lee Ranaldo

title: I've always been the type that, every few months, I'm like, 'Let's change the haircut one more time.'
author: Coco Rocha

title: I change my style maybe every month. I'm, like, punk one month, ghetto fab the next, classy the next. I'm just young and finding out who I am.
author: Kylie Jenner

author: David Attenborough

title: Change can be frightening, and the temptation is often to resist it. But change almost always provides opportunities - to learn new things, to rethink tired processes, and to improve the way we work.
author: Klaus Schwab

title: It's important to think good, speak good, and do good. If we want to see positive change in the world, then we need to connect to goodness. I try in everything I do, both in business and philanthropy, to make a positive change and do that by doing good.
author: Shari Arison

title: Our only security is our ability to change.
author: John Lilly

title: You cannot carry out fundamental change without a certain amount of madness.
author: Thomas Sankara

title: The way to change the world is through individual responsibility and taking local action in your own community.
author: Jeff Bridges

title: Climate change is the Everest of all problems, the thorniest challenge facing humankind.
author: Lewis Gordon Pugh
